izzy.classification.specificity¶

izzy.classification.specificity(y_true, y_pred, sample_weights=None)[source]¶

Compute the specificity (synonyms: selectivity, true negative rate)

Parameters

  • y_true (ArrayLike) – True outcomes

  • y_pred (ArrayLike) – Predicted outcomes

  • sample_weights (ArrayLike) – Weight for individual observations

Returns

Specificity for each class

Return type

dict
